name: House of Cards Trilogy: The Final Cut
summary: The concluding series of the highly acclaimed political drama finds the ruthless and manipulative Francis Urquhart, who is still Prime Minister, deeply involved in a foreign war over oil trading. Once again he is quick to abuse his influence, to ensure a handsome consultancy fee for himself if he can settle the dispute his way. Can he remain invincible as the highly charged political events start spiralling out of his control? An award winning drama starring Ian Richardson and Diane Fletcher.
